name: Siphon Power
description: When you slay your foes, you can siphon a measure of their strength, growing stronger with each kill you make.
effect: Whenever this hero slays a foe with a weapon action, you can add 1 to each of their remaining hero dice, up to a maximum of 6.
additionalEffect: you can instead add 2 to each of their remaining hero dice, up to a maximum score of 6.
